item.description:
A great place to get a deal on last years new equipment. Also get deals on ski & stay packages, equipment advice, demos and much more. I have gone every year for the last 6 and always come home with some good stuff. last year we had a booth for the Wedeln Club, this year we will tone it down a bit. Instead we will meet saturday morning and check out the booths and exhibits together.

Maybe we can do a brunch together before we go in. Does anyone know a good place for breakfast near the Bayside Expo Center?

for more info and to buy a slightly cheaper ticket check out:
http://www.onthesnow....
item.name: Boston Ski & Snowboard Expo
